text: Frederico Carlos Soares Campos (11 April 1927 – 1 March 2021) was a Brazilian politician. He twice was Mayor of Cuiabá from 1966 until 1969 and again from 1989 to 1992. He also was the 45th Governor of Mato Grosso from 1979 until 1983. Campos was a member of the Liberal Front Party and Brazilian Labour Party. Campos was born in Cuiabá. He died from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil in Cuiabá on 1 March 2021 at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Brazilian mayors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:People from Mato Grosso
title: Frederico Campos
